#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
	    long int n;
	    cin>>n;
	    char str[n];
	    cin>>str;
	    int x,temp;
	    for(int i=0; i<n; ++i){
	        cin>>x;
	        temp = str[i];
	        str[i] = str[x-1];
	        str[x-1] = temp;
	    }
	    cout<<str<<"\n";
	    
	}
	
	return 0;
}
